text:
SECTION: 2018 Champion (S1) Question 3 Assumption
CONTEXT: Food distribution strategy (Agent-Based).
CONTENT: The model assumes that the **individual agents are perfectly rational** and will only travel to a center if the **monetary value of the food** strictly outweighs the opportunity cost of their time and travel expense.

SECTION: 2018 Champion (S1) Question 3 Model
CONTEXT: Food distribution strategy.
CONTENT: A Computational Simulation (Agent-Based approach) was used. It modeled individuals as rational economic agents who only travel to a food distribution center if the value of the food exceeds the travel cost and opportunity cost of time.
